means: （使）枯萎， （使）干枯， （使）凋谢( wither的过去式和过去分词 )
萎缩，（尤指渐渐）破灭，消失

sentence.Network_en: She has one slightly withered leg, noticeably thinner than the other.
sentence.Network_cn: 她有一条腿有点儿萎缩，看上去明显比另一条腿瘦。

sentence.Network_en: His fridge was bare apart from three very withered tomatoes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的冰箱里除了3个非常干瘪的西红柿外已经空空如也。

sentence.Network_en: When he went into retirement, he visibly withered.
sentence.Network_cn: 他到退休年龄时已老态毕现。

entry.tran: (人或身体部位)瘦弱的，衰老的，枯槁的
entry.def: If you describe a person or a part of their body as withered, you mean that they are thin and their skin looks old.

entry.tran: (四肢因疾病或受伤)瘦弱的，萎缩的
entry.def: Withered is used to describe someone's leg or arm when it is thin and weak because of disease or injury.

example.ex: She has one slightly withered leg, noticeably thinner than the other.
example.tran: 她有一条腿有点儿萎缩，看上去明显比另一条腿瘦。

means.word_mean: 1. lean and wrinkled by shrinkage as from age or illness;

sentences.sentence: "a lanky scarecrow of a man with withered face and lantern jaws"-W.F.Starkie
"he did well despite his withered arm"
"a wizened little man with frizzy gray hair"

means.word_mean: 2. (used especially of vegetation) having lost all moisture;

sentences.sentence: "the desert was edged with sere vegetation"

auth_sentence.content: Thousands of farms went bust, whole communities withered.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thousands of farms went bust, whole communities withered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thousands of farms went bust, whole communities withered.

auth_sentence.content: Her fingers were like claws, withered and twisted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her fingers were like claws, withered and twisted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her fingers were like claws, withered and twisted.

auth_sentence.content: The industry has already withered on the vine.
auth_sentence.res_content: The industry has already withered on the vine.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The industry has already withered on the vine.

sentences.en: The leaves of this tree have become dry and withered.
sentences.cn: 这棵树下的叶子干枯了。

sentences.en: The fairest rose is at last withered.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰再艳丽,最终要凋零。

sentences.en: The plant may recover;it’s very dry and withered,but there’s still life in it.
sentences.cn: 这植物虽然干枯了,但有可能重现生机,因为它还没有死。
